Package teal.render.geometry

Provides geometry generators and support.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HasFromTo
    Interface for rendered objects that have a start point and end point (such as Line).
    HasHeight
    Interface for rendered objects that have height.
    HasLength
    Interface for rendered objects that have length.
    HasRadius
    Interface for rendered objects that have a radius.
    HasWidth
    Interface for rendered objects that have width.
    TGeometry
    The TGeometry interface defines a general structure for indexed geometry arrays.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AxisShape
    A geometry generation utility class that lofts a polygon by rotating it around 0,0,0; y values are not changed.
    Cylinder
    This class contains static methods for generating geometry for a Cylinder, using AxisShape to loft a rectangle around the y axis.
    GeometryData
    Provides a generalized container for geometry, including Vertex, color, normals and texture info.
    GeomUtil
    This class provides some utility functions for manipulating GeometryArrays.
    Path  
    Pipe
    This class contains methods for generating "pipe" geometry (a pipe is a hollow cylinder with no end caps).
    Ring
    This class generates geometry for a "Ring", which is a hollow cylinder.
    Sphere
    This class generates spherical geometry by lofting a two dimensional half-circle around the y axis.
    Torus
    Constructs a torus with the ring's center at R1, the radius of the swept ring is R2.

Package teal.render.geometry Description

Provides geometry generators and support. Also provides as well simple geometric primitives.
